champagne.name: Champagne Room
champagne.description: Absolutely no sex is allowed here. There are chairs arranged around a coffee table with magazines in the center of the room. There is a ðŸ”‘ on the table next to a *spoon*.

items.name: spoon
items.description: Shiny and tiny, you can see your reflection in it. Perfect fit for a bowl of peanut butter

items.name: drug
items.description: The drug is green and vegetal. Smells like your uncle

items.name: ðŸ”‘
items.description: "_The ðŸ”‘ to more success is coco butter_"

items.name: magazines
items.description: These magazines are a few years old, from back when DJ Khaled had no jacuzzi

quiet.name: Quiet Room
quiet.description: The walls are covered with art that seems misguided. This room is for relaxing, and you can tell. Plants grow from the ceiling in long vines.

sun.name: Sun Room
sun.description: Light spills in from the 3 walls of windows around you. There is a large pile of sand with a stingray floating lazily above it
